General.Name: Spring Airlines Co Ltd
General.Description: Spring Airlines Co., Ltd. engages in the air passenger and cargo transportation business in China. The company also provides services related to air transportation; intercity chartered passenger transportation; city-county fixed-line tourist passenger transportation; cargo transportation, health, life, accident, and liability insurance products; prepackaged food; craft gifts, household appliances, daily necessities, Wujinjiaodian, textiles, electronic products, chemical raw materials, metal materials, instruments and meters, mechanical equipment, staff canteen, aviation catering, aviation ground services; and technical services in the field of aviation technology. In addition, it engages in the import and export business of goods and technologies; wholesale and retail of auto parts; self-owned equipment leasing business; real estate development and operation; advertising; financial leasing business; leasing business, etc. As of December 31, 2022, the company owned and operated a fleet of 116 aircraft. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Shanghai, China. Spring Airlines Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanghai Spring International Travel Service (Group) Co. LTD.

1.Name: Mr. Chen  Ke
1.Title: CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors
